title: Album Page, "Sketch of Coat of Arms with Lion Rampant", ca. 1888
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on tracing paper mounted to cream paperboard tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, lower right of sheet: Chenonceaux / Lion on wall in / turret - / Top of shield vermillion red / very little lighter than / the wall which is / red also - venetian red / Lion is cobalt - / Lower shield ochre; upper right of mount: 55; lower right of mount: 4.. (corner edge missing).
dimensions: 27.2 x 21.2 cm (10 11/16 x 8 3/8 in.), irregular; mount: 31.3 x 24.1 cm (12 5/16 x 9 1/2 in.), irregular
description: Vertical sheet with the outline of a shield sketched in graphite.  The upper fifth of the shield is colored in bright red, while part of the bottom section of the shield is colored ochre yellow with water spots very visible from the medium.  In the center is a royal blue lion rampant facing to the left.

tombstone.epitaph: Album Page, "Sketch of Coat of Arms with Lion Rampant", ca. 1888.Brush and watercolor, graphite on tracing paper mounted to cream paperboard tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-221.
